description: Learn to build powerful, AI-driven automations using both visual node-based tools like n8n and conversational platforms like Ona AI.
title: AI-Powered Workflow Automation: From Visual Builders to Natural Language
categories: Workflow Automation, n8n, Ona AI, No-Code, AI
readme:
# AI-Powered Workflow Automation

Master two modern approaches to automation. Build complex AI agents with the visual, node-based power of n8n, then create workflows instantly using plain English with Ona AI.
short_description: Build AI automations with n8n's visual canvas and Ona AI's natural language interface.
